issue.title: [CF 386] Metaicons sortable by time remaining
issue.body:
Related to the bug I just reported I also want to ask if you could possibly add an enhancement to the addon. I want an icon to check the shortest remaining cooldown out of the internal cooldown of Taste for Blood, Mortal Strike and Colossus Smash. You might point out that the icon I posted already does that via a unit cooldown icon. However there is something else to Colossus Smash, that I cannot properly check for with a unit cooldown icon. Colossus Smash can proc and be ready instantly. When that happens I don't want to know the cooldown of Colossus Smash anymore, I know want to know the remaining duration of the Colossus Smash debuff on the target. Otherwise I might end up overriding an already existing Colossus Smash debuff. So I want to choose the longer one out of the Colossus Smash cooldown and debuff, and then I want to choose the shortest one out of Colossus Smash, Mortal Strike and Thirst for Blood. The easiest way I can imagine doing that is with a metaicon that sorts its subicons by time remaining (ascending/descending). One for Colossus Smash (descending), and then that plus Mortal Strike and Thirst for Blood (ascending).

Could you make this happen? I'm sure this is also going to come in handy elsewhere eventually.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #386 | Raw
